short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate optimized tweets via OpenAI's GPT engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily generate custom tweets using OpenAI!

TwOp (Tweet Optimizer) is an extension that provides a simple, user-friendly interface, allowing you to quickly and efficiently create compelling material for your followers.

Features:
✅ Custom topic and keywords for the tweet
✅ Select themes & tones that you want to express 
✅ AI generates tweets tailored to your specifications 
✅ Extension use is free with no ads  (use your own OpenAI API key)

TwOp works great for businesses and individuals alike, as it provides a quick and easy way to create engaging content. It is the perfect tool to help you draft tweets for promoting a new product, expressing a personal opinion, or summarizing larger text with a simple few clicks. Add the extension now and start creating high-quality and persuasive tweets!

***

Docs:
https://github.com/MyDeLife/TwOp

The entire code, including AI prompts, is open-source and released under MIT license.

***

Version Update:
1.1 - updated host_permission in manifest to openai.com and its sub-domains
